subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der4|lang=ja
|{{ja-r|破%魔|は%ま}}: [[exorcism]]
|{{ja-r|破%戒|は%かい}}: breaking a commandment
|{{ja-r|破%獄|は%ごく}}: a [[jailbreak]]
|{{ja-r|破%産|は%さん}}: [[bankruptcy]]
|{{ja-r|破%壊|は%かい}}: [[fracture]]
|{{ja-r|破%格|は%かく}}: [[exceptional]]
|{{ja-r|破%棄|は%き}}: [[discard]]
|{{ja-r|破%局|は%きょく}}: [[catastrophe]]
|{{ja-r|破%砕|は%さい}}: [[crushing]]
|{{ja-r|破%算|は%さん}}: a [[fresh]] [[start]]
|{{ja-r|破%傷%風|は%しょう%ふう}}: [[tetanus]]
|{{ja-r|破%船|は%せん}}: [[shipwreck]]
|{{ja-r|破%損|は%そん}}: [[damage]]
|{{ja-r|破%綻|は%たん}}: [[bankruptcy]]
|{{ja-r|破%談|は%だん}}: [[break off]]
|{{ja-r|破%天%荒|は%てん%こう}}: [[unprecedented]]
|{{ja-r|破%風|は%ふ}}: [[gable]]
|{{ja-r|破%屋|は%おく}}
|{{ja-r|破%屋|やぶれ%や}}
|{{ja-r|破%瓜|は%か}}
|{{ja-r|破%滅|は%めつ}}: [[destruction]]
|{{ja-r|破%門|は%もん}}: [[excommunication]]
|{{ja-r|破%約|は%やく}}: [[cancellation]] or [[breaking]] of a [[contract]]
|{{ja-r|破%裂|は%れつ}}: [[explosion]]
|{{ja-r|破%廉%恥|は%れん%ち}}: [[shameless]], [[scandalous]], [[disgraceful]]
|{{ja-r|破%城%槌|は%じょう%つい}}: a [[battering ram]]
}}
